adHeader: ALAMEDA apartment cleaning. MOVE OUT CLEANING last minute ok $12/HOUR
adDetails: We are working as cleaning home and apartment, our specialty is moving out and in cleaning, we are a team of 2 mother Lai and daughter Diann. We have our own cleaning supply, cleaning equipment such as heavy duty Dyson DC28 animal vacuum cleaner, Shark electric steam mop to clean and sanitize your bathroom and kitchen floors and degreaser to clean out oven like new(see picture below we buy best & newest equipment for your home cleaning). We do monthly, biweekly and weekly $12/hour. MOVE IN and MOVE OUT cleaning is our specialty, we don't mind working on weekend and holiday at no extra charge, we make every effort to accommodate last minute request. We try to always be available. We do excellent work, dependable and always on time. We charge flat fee for move out cleaning. Please give us a try as you will be happy with our work. Please call Trin at show contact info he is the son in law. Thank you
